title: Safe to cut Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) : r/lasercutting - Reddit
body: Any life near your ventilation outlet is at risk and this will also contribute to environmental pollution. Particulate left behind in vent system and within the machine could be hazardous if ingested. #1 can be mitigated by a few "test fires" while holding a fire extinguisher at ready, but the worst case is messy ...
